name: InsulinMedication
title: Insulin Medication
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Insulin clinical drug components and generic packages.),(Data Element Scope: Insulin clinical drug components and generic packages used to determine whether a patient that requires home glucose monitoring, and is  covered by US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid, has been prescribed insulin.),(Inclusion Criteria: Insulin clinical drug components and generic packages as defined in RxNorm.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
